channel.title: NPC Monsters?
channel.description: How do i make a monster spawn? Alot of mobs arnt here i tryed to figure it out for 1hour now ; ;

item.title: NPC Monsters?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

find npc.cfg
its probably in a folder called config
well anyways
right click it and open it with note pad
the first part
spawn = … is your npc id
the next two parts are where itll spawn (absX absY)
the last stuff is for other things

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Monsters?
item.dc:creator: @Zenna Zenna
item.description:
@Zenna wrote:

This is from a tut made a while ago I DIDNT MAKE IT

[quote=“God of Ikiliki
, post:2, topic:176882”]Adding NPC’s
To add NPC’s you work in autospawn.cfg
Open it and you will see many things looking like eachother.
Now add this somewhere
Code:
spawn = NpcID CoordX CoordY 0 0 0 0 0 2 NPC NameChange NpcID to the ID of the npc.
Change CoordX and CoordY to the coords where you want the npc to be.
If you don’t know how to get the coords press F4 (Moparscape client).
Also, no your not a ub3r good coder when you made a command or added a npc.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Monsters?
item.dc:creator: @Zenna Zenna
item.description:
@Zenna wrote:

oh, im kind of an ametuer to (or however you spell it)
Ill try my best to explain it to you…
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2008, 07:55:49 PM[/size][hr]Go into the folder that is labeled autospawn.cfg (it might not have .cfg after it, it depends on the source of the server)
anyway, go in there, and youll see a huge list of characters, and a lot of lines looking like eachother…

Now add this somewhere, (anywhere except after where it says [ENDOFSPAWNLIST])

Code:
spawn = NpcID CoordX CoordY 0 0 0 0 0 2 NPC NameChange NpcID to the ID of the npc.
Change CoordX and CoordY to the coords where you want the npc to be.
If you don’t know how to get the coords press F4 (Moparscape client).
Also, no your not a ub3r good coder when you made a command or added a npc.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2008, 07:58:29 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Twilightsin, post:1, topic:176883”]How do i make a monster spawn? Alot of mobs arnt here i tryed to figure it out for 1hour now ; ;[/quote]

Go into the folder that is labeled autospawn.cfg (it might not have .cfg after it, it depends on the source of the server)
anyway, go in there, and youll see a huge list of characters, and a lot of lines looking like eachother…

Now add this somewhere, (anywhere except after where it says [ENDOFSPAWNLIST])

Code:
spawn = NpcID CoordX CoordY 0 0 0 0 0 2 NPC NameChange NpcID to the ID of the npc.
Change CoordX and CoordY to the coords where you want the npc to be.
If you don’t know how to get the coords press F4 (Moparscape client).
Also, no your not a ub3r good coder when you made a command or added a npc.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Monsters?
item.dc:creator: @Zenna Zenna
item.description:
@Zenna wrote:

Go into the NPC folder, and press ctrl + F, and type this, then fill in the Y and X coords u want the NPC to be in, and The NpcID part with the NPC’s code…

spawn = NpcID CoordX CoordY 0 0 0 0 0 2 NPC Name

Like this:
spawn = 50 3521 3521 0 0 0 0 0 2 King Black dragon

Read full topic
